description:
Lucky had a good time at the pet salon. Cinnamon wants in. Charlie gets a bait-and-switch. Julian is all alone, and Marutarou needs some social distancing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can`t Wait for Summer!! Great Battle in a Dress and a Loincloth!!!
Machikirenakute... Natsu!! Onepi to Fundoshi de Iza Jinjou ni Shoubu!!!
أنا متحمّس للصيف! معركة عظيمة بقطعة واحدة ومئزر
待ちきれなくて... 夏!! ワンピと褌でいざ尋常に勝負!!!
